projects.projectDescription: A regex engine that doesn't just match patterns but tries to understand the context behind them. Imagine it as a curious intern who, instead of blindly scanning text, asks why a pattern occurs and learns from exceptions to improve its guesses next time.

A simulation framework for quantum circuits where you can tinker with qubits and gates and see how entanglement unfolds. It's less about building production tools and more about giving researchers a sandbox to visualize quantum weirdness.

An experiment in weaving together multiple neural network architectures to see if hybrid models can capture nuances that single networks miss. Think of it as throwing a neural party and seeing who ends up talking to whom.

A research tool that ingests satellite imagery and environmental data to detect subtle ecological shifts over time. It's like giving a microscope to climate patterns and trying to spot whispers of change before they scream.

A project exploring emergent behaviors in language models when put in constrained linguistic environments. Basically, seeing how an AI creatively navigates its own made-up rules and what that tells us about language comprehension.
